docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 18.--The Brazilian and Uruguayan delegates studying a bilateral trade agreement as part of the Montevideo economic conference agreed at this afternoon's session to recommend to their respective governments a reciprocal granting of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 18.--The Brazilian and Uruguayan delegates studying a bilateral trade agreement as part of the Montevideo economic conference agreed at this afternoon's session to recommend to their respective governments a reciprocal granting of equal duties.
docs.abstract: Brazil and Uruguay reach bilateral agreement; ratification expected

headline.main: BRAZIL AND URUGUAY REACH TARIFF ACCORD; Bilateral Agreement Is First Reached at Montevideo Conference--Must Be Ratified.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 19.--The Uruguayan Public Health Service today put into operation the first South American airplane ambulance, which is capable of rushing to Montevideo urgent cases from any part of the interior. The plane flew to several Brazilian...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 19.--The Uruguayan Public Health Service today put into operation the first South American airplane ambulance, which is capable of rushing to Montevideo urgent cases from any part of the interior. The plane flew to several Brazilian frontier points today with anti-smallpox serum.
docs.abstract: Pub Health Service starts operation of airplane ambulance

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19.--Ralph Miller of New York City, vice consul at Buenos Aires, has been confirmed as secretary in the diplomatic service and designated third secretary of the legation at Montevideo, Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19.--Ralph Miller of New York City, vice consul at Buenos Aires, has been confirmed as secretary in the diplomatic service and designated third secretary of the legation at Montevideo, Uruguay.
docs.abstract: Designated 3rd sec of legation at Montevideo
